title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
Hi,
This board had few small spots of water damage, I repaired them, and now I have chime, orange light on charger, but no display on mini display port. Internal display is ok, blinking folder.

R5350 and R5351 are ok, 2 kohm, voltage on all their pins is 3.4V

PP3V3RHV_S4_TBTBPWR_F = 3.3V
PP3V3_S4_TBTAPWR = 3.3V

PP15V_TBT =0V
TBT_A_HV_EN =0V
S4_PWR_EN =3.3V

R2887=10 kohm

Any idea how to continue?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
HDMI also not working?
Thunderbolt problems usually not worth to spend time only for external video.

Check TBT_A/B_HPD on U3220/320, depending which port used.

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message: HDMI is not able to display the blinking folder, correct? I should test from OS X?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
So, for what I have checked also with another board, there is no blinking folder possible on HDMI.
For this board HDMI is working, within OS X

With display port connected on A:
TBT_A_HPD = 3.3V
DP_TBTPA_HPD =3.3V

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message: Any idea to try to solve this issue?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
15V_TBT is there?
Do you get voltage at C3211/86?
Check the other port too.

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
PP15V_TBT = 0V, with or without cable connected
In diode mode, I have 0.56V on C3315
PPVIN_SW_TBTBST = 0V
TBT_A_HV_EN = 0V, with or without cable connected
also,
TBT_B_HV_EN = 0V, with or without cable connected

Port A:
On C3286: PP3V3_S4_TBTAPWR =3.3V
On C3211: PP3V3RHV_S4_TBTAPWR =3.3V
Port B:
On C3386: PP3V3_S4_TBTBPWR =3.3V
On C3311: PP3V3RHV_S4_TBTBPWR=3.3V
I have these values with or without cable connected

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message: Check if U2800 gets all required voltages (page 24).

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
Here are the voltages on U2800:
PP1V05_TBTRDV = 1.01V
PP1V05_TBT = 1.01V
P1V05TBT_SW = 0.95V
PP1V05_TBTCIO = 1.00V
PP3V3_S4_TBT = 3.3V
PP3V3_S4_TBT_F = 3.3V
PP3V3_TBTLC = 3.3V
PP3V3_TBTRDV = 3.3V

TBT_EN_CIO_PWR_L = 0V
TBT_PWR_REQ_L = 0V

Seems ok. I have these values with or without cable connected

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
Check TBT_POC_RESET_L and TBT_PWR_ON_POC_RST_L.

You can try changing/reflashing U2890.
If still the same, change U2800.

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
TBT_POC_RESET_L = 3.3V
TBT_PWR_ON_POC_RST_L  = 3.3V

Can I try to replace with U2890 from a spare 820-3787 board, also with 2 display ports?
Do you have a dump for this chip?
I can flash with the same tool I use for SPI ROM/BIOS, correct?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message: U2890 is a SPI chip; any BIOS programmer should do the job.

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
Ok.
Can I try to replace U2890 with the same chip from a spare 820-3787 board, also with 2 display ports?
Do you have a dump for this chip?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
I don't have TBT ROM for these old machines.

Don't forget to make backup of them first.

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message: Ok, last question:  can I try to replace U2890 with the same chip from a spare 820-3787 board, also with 2 display ports?

title: 820-3476 no display on mini display port
message:
You can try, but...
If doesn't work, you can't be sure if is incompatible, or board has other problem,
